text: @NightlyPolitics It's bad enough that some pro-Trump commentators downplay the severity of COVID-19, but to have them, like O'Reilly, disparage the worth of the lives of the COVID-19 vicitms is despicable. They add to the pain of the loved ones of those who died simply to "score" political points

domain.name: Person
domain.description: Named people in the world like Nelson Mandela
